verses.roman:
evam āśvāsya pitarau
bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
mātāmahaṁ tūgrasenaṁ
yadūnām akaron ṇṛpam

synonyms: evam—in this way; āśvāsya—assuring; pitarau—His parents; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; devakī-sutaḥ—the son of Devakī; mātāmaham—His maternal grandfather; tu—and; ugrasenam—Ugrasena; yadūnām—of the Yadus; akarot—He made; nṛpam—King.
translation: Thus having comforted His mother and father, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, appearing as the son of Devakī, installed His maternal grandfather, Ugrasena, as King of the Yadus.
